text: In the United States Navy, ships belong to different classes depending on how they are judged by the Secretary of the Navy under the President of the United States.https://www.navsea.navy.mil/Home/Team- Ships/Shipbuilding-101/#:~:text=This%20act%20stated%20that%20%22all,called%20after%20the%20States%20of ==Sources cited== Category:Naval ships of the United States
title: US Navy classes
